local_intent: Align to the T-block and execute a leftward 0.1 m push (180°) with retries, verifying visibility afterward.
assumptions: Block pose is roughly known and reachable; workspace is clear for a side push.
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer phase of the global plan: yaw set to 90°, precise approach, then a push of distance 0.1 toward 180°, matching GLOBAL_BT parameters; adds retry for robustness and verifies post-action visibility.
